answerText: Brideshead Revisited[10] This other Waugh novel is about Tony Last, who is forced to read the works of Charles Dickens by Mr. Todd, a resident of a Brazilian village.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 12 | 16 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel befriends Sebastian Flyte and is introduced to Sebastian's sister Julia, who marries Rex Mottram but plans to get a divorce to marry the protagonist. For 10 points each: [10] Name this work by Evelyn Waugh in which Charles Ryder meets the Marchmain family and hopes to control the title estate.
